price: “Our Lord, we believe in what You have sent down and we follow the messenger; so count us among those who bear witness [to the truth].”
arabic: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلۡتَ وَٱتَّبَعۡنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكۡتُبۡنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
